DataElement.preferredName: Superficial Disease or Disorder Recurrence Clinical Confirmed Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the date related to clinical confirmation of superficial disease from recurrence.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Superficial Disease or Disorder Recurrence Clinical Confirmed
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to clinical confirmation of superficial disease from recurrence.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Of little substance or significance; involving only a surface.:Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.

Concepts.definition: Of little substance or significance; involving only a surface.

Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.

Property.preferredDefinition: To occur again.:Having to do with the examination and treatment of patients.:Confirmed; having been established or verified.

Concepts.definition: Relating to the examination and treatment of patients dependent on direct observation.  The term may also refer to the institution (clinic) providing this activity.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.origin: ECOG CRF:Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
